state.code:
erDiagram
    EXHIBIT {
        int exhibit_id PK
        string name
        string description
        string author
        int year_created
        string category
        string storage_location
        string photo_path
        date acquisition_date
        string condition
        float insurance_value
    }
    
    EXHIBITION {
        int exhibition_id PK
        string name
        string description
        date start_date
        date end_date
        string location
        string status
        float ticket_price_standard
        float ticket_price_discounted
        float ticket_price_child
    }
    
    EXHIBITION_EXHIBIT {
        int exhibition_id PK, FK
        int exhibit_id PK, FK
        date date_added
        string display_notes
    }
    
    STAFF {
        int staff_id PK
        string first_name
        string last_name
        string position
        string email
        string phone
        string address
        date hire_date
        string username
        string password_hash
        string role
    }
    
    WORK_SCHEDULE {
        int schedule_id PK
        int staff_id FK
        date work_date
        time start_time
        time end_time
    }
    
    TICKET {
        int ticket_id PK
        int exhibition_id FK
        date purchase_date
        time purchase_time
        string ticket_type
        float price
        string payment_method
        string status
    }
    
    VISITOR {
        int visitor_id PK
        string first_name
        string last_name
        string email
        string phone
        date first_visit
        date last_visit
        int visit_count
    }
    
    SPECIAL_EVENT {
        int event_id PK
        string name
        string description
        date event_date
        time start_time
        time end_time
        string location
        int max_participants
        float ticket_price
    }
    
    VISITOR_EVENT {
        int visitor_id PK, FK
        int event_id PK, FK
        date registration_date
        string notes
        string status
    }
    
    BACKUP_LOG {
        int backup_id PK
        date backup_date
        time backup_time
        string backup_path
        string status
        int staff_id FK
    }
    
    USER_ACCESS_LOG {
        int log_id PK
        int staff_id FK
        datetime access_time
        string action
        string ip_address
        string details
    }

    EXHIBIT ||--o{ EXHIBITION_EXHIBIT : "displayed_in"
    EXHIBITION ||--o{ EXHIBITION_EXHIBIT : "contains"
    EXHIBITION ||--o{ TICKET : "sold_for"
    STAFF ||--o{ WORK_SCHEDULE : "works_by"
    STAFF ||--o{ BACKUP_LOG : "performed_by"
    STAFF ||--o{ USER_ACCESS_LOG : "logged_by"
    VISITOR ||--o{ TICKET : "purchased_by"
    VISITOR ||--o{ VISITOR_EVENT : "participates_in"
    SPECIAL_EVENT ||--o{ VISITOR_EVENT : "has_participants"
